nodes.bodyText: extensionSslNativeSupport does not seem to be used. Can it perhaps be removed?
feature does not seem to be used. Can it perhaps be removed?
additionalBeans does not seem to be used. Can it perhaps be removed?
I think keeping it M6 would be correct - that's the real first version although only JVM was supported there.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -31,7 +33,7 @@
     <description>The aws2-sns component is used for sending messages to an Amazon Simple Notification Topic.</description>
 
     <properties>
-        <firstVersion>1.0.0-M6</firstVersion>
+        <firstVersion>1.0.0-M7</firstVersion>

nodes.bodyText: How is this asterisk key matched? The S3 extension checks both camel.component.aws2-s3 and camel.component.aws2-* and uses whichever of the two is set?
